dcterms:description: A corpus of audiovisual data collected from 10 patients with Alzheimer's disease and 10 controls, focusing on disfluences in speech and gestures during repetition tasks with and without imposed gestures.
dcterms:title: Disfluences Corpus in Alzheimer's Disease
